Generate a self-signed SSL certificate and key

To generate a quick and easy self signed certificate and private key, run the following command with any system that has openssl installed. openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout key.pem -out cert.pem -sha256 -days 365 --nodes There is a code snipped of the command here -> snippet
